ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So turn away from them, for you are not to blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Turn away from them. You will not be blamed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So turn your attention away from them; you shall incur no blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), leave them alone and you will not be blamed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore turn away from them (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), – so there is no blame upon you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So turn away from them, you are not blameworthy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then turn your back upon them for you are not to blame;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So turn thou from them; thou wilt not be reproached.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So withdraw from them (O Muhammad), for thou art in no wise blameworthy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so ignore them, you are not to blame,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So turn away thou from them, not thou art blameworthy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So turn away from them, as you will not be blameworthy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So turn away from them: not thine is the blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So turn away (O Muhammad SAW) from them (Quraish pagans) you are not to be blamed (as you have conveyed Allah's Message).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So turn away from them, you shall not be blamed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So turn away from them; you are not to blame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:54] So shun them, for you will not be reproached, because you have conveyed the Message to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So withdraw from them) so turn away from them, Muhammad, (for thou art in nowise blameworthy) in Our sight; you have left them with no excuse and you have indeed conveyed the message. After this, Allah commanded him to fight them
